info.title: AV conference API
info.description: API documentation for the AV conference

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Filter the meetings by the given page no

parameters.name: size
parameters.description: Limit the size of the data

parameters.name: status
parameters.description:
Filter the meetings by the given status id 
Eg: 1 - Scheduled,
    2 - In progress,
    3 - Completed,
    4 - Cancelled

parameters.name: from
parameters.description: Filter based on given start date

parameters.name: to
parameters.description: Filter the meetings by the given end date

parameters.name: month
parameters.description: Filter the meetings by the given month

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description:
Sort the page by ascending or descending order
Eg: asc - sort by ascending,
    desc- sort by descending

parameters.name: createdBy
parameters.description: Filter the meetings by the scheduler

parameters.name: organizer
parameters.description: Filter the meetings by the organizer

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Meeting id

get.description: Retrieve the meeting details by id

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Meeting id

get.description: Retrieve list of participants of the meeting

patch.description: Update the details of the participants

delete.description: Delete the participants of the meeting

parameters.description: Meeting id

parameters.name: uId
parameters.description: [GET,POST]-Meeting user id, [PATCH] - User session id

patch.description: Update the user session by user session id

parameters.description: Meeting id

parameters.name: recId
parameters.description: Meeting recoring id

patch.description: Update the meeting recording by the recording id

delete.description: Delete the meeting recording by the recording id

parameters.name: recId
parameters.description: Recording id

parameters.name: muId
parameters.description: [POST] - Meeting user id and [DELETE] - Bookmark id

post.description: Create boomark for the meeting recording

delete.description: Delete the bookmark by bookmar id
